name: LangtonsAntJS
body:
<canvas height='1000' width='1000' id='example'>Обновите браузер</canvas> 
<script> 
var example = document.getElementById("example");
ctx = example.getContext('2d');

function mur(num) {
	//console.log(num);
   if ((++array[x[num]][y[num]]) == 1){
		direction[num]--;
        ctx.fillRect(x[num] * d, y[num] * d, d, d);
    }else{
		direction[num]++;
		array[x[num]][y[num]] = 0;
    	ctx.clearRect(x[num] * d, y[num] * d, d, d);
	}
    
    if(direction[num]==-1)
		direction[num]=3;
	
	if(direction[num]==4)
		direction[num]=0;
		
    
    if (direction[num] == 0) {
        x[num]++;
    } else if (direction[num] == 1) {
        y[num]++;
    } else if (direction[num] == 2) {
        x[num]--;
    } else if (direction[num] == 3) {
        y[num]--;
    }
	
	if(x[num]==-1){
		direction[num]=3;
		x[num]=0;
	}else if(y[num]==-1){
		direction[num]=0;
		y[num]=0;
	}else if(x[num]==D){
		x[num]=D-1;
		direction[num]=1;
	}else if(y[num]==D){
		y[num]=D-1;
		direction[num]=2;
	}
}

var counter = 0;
var D = 200;
var d = 5;

var array = Array.apply(null,new Array(D)).map(Number.prototype.valueOf,0);
for (var i = 0; i < D; i++){
	array[i] = Array.apply(null,new Array(D)).map(Number.prototype.valueOf,0);
}
    	
var direction = [0,1,2,3,0];
var x =[ D/4, D*3/4, D*3/4,D/4,D/2];
var y =[ D/4, D*3/4, D/4, D*3/4,D/2];

setInterval(function() {
	//console.log(1);
   if ((++array[x[1]][y[1]]) == 1){
		direction[1]--;
		ctx.fillStyle="#FF00FF";
        ctx.fillRect(x[1] * d, y[1] * d, d, d);
    }else{
		direction[1]++;
		array[x[1]][y[1]] = 0;
    	ctx.clearRect(x[1] * d, y[1] * d, d, d);
	}
    
    if(direction[1]==-1)
		direction[1]=3;
	
	if(direction[1]==4)
		direction[1]=0;
		
    
    if (direction[1] == 0) {
        x[1]++;
    } else if (direction[1] == 1) {
        y[1]++;
    } else if (direction[1] == 2) {
        x[1]--;
    } else if (direction[1] == 3) {
        y[1]--;
    }
	
	if(x[1]==-1){
		direction[1]=3;
		x[1]=0;
	}else if(y[1]==-1){
		direction[1]=0;
		y[1]=0;
	}else if(x[1]==D){
		x[1]=D-1;
		direction[1]=1;
	}else if(y[1]==D){
		y[1]=D-1;
		direction[1]=2;
	}
}, 0);
setInterval(function() {
	//console.log(2);
   if ((++array[x[2]][y[2]]) == 1){
		direction[2]--;
		ctx.fillStyle="#0000FF";
        ctx.fillRect(x[2] * d, y[2] * d, d, d);
    }else{
		direction[2]++;
		array[x[2]][y[2]] = 0;
    	ctx.clearRect(x[2] * d, y[2] * d, d, d);
	}
    
    if(direction[2]==-1)
		direction[2]=3;
	
	if(direction[2]==4)
		direction[2]=0;
		
    
    if (direction[2] == 0) {
        x[2]++;
    } else if (direction[2] == 1) {
        y[2]++;
    } else if (direction[2] == 2) {
        x[2]--;
    } else if (direction[2] == 3) {
        y[2]--;
    }
	
	if(x[2]==-1){
		direction[2]=3;
		x[2]=0;
	}else if(y[2]==-1){
		direction[2]=0;
		y[2]=0;
	}else if(x[2]==D){
		x[2]=D-1;
		direction[2]=1;
	}else if(y[2]==D){
		y[2]=D-1;
		direction[2]=2;
	}
}, 0);
setInterval(function() {
	//console.log(3);
   if ((++array[x[3]][y[3]]) == 1){
		direction[3]--;
		ctx.fillStyle="#00FF00";
        ctx.fillRect(x[3] * d, y[3] * d, d, d);
    }else{
		direction[3]++;
		array[x[3]][y[3]] = 0;
    	ctx.clearRect(x[3] * d, y[3] * d, d, d);
	}
    
    if(direction[3]==-1)
		direction[3]=3;
	
	if(direction[3]==4)
		direction[3]=0;
		
    
    if (direction[3] == 0) {
        x[3]++;
    } else if (direction[3] == 1) {
        y[3]++;
    } else if (direction[3] == 2) {
        x[3]--;
    } else if (direction[3] == 3) {
        y[3]--;
    }
	
	if(x[3]==-1){
		direction[3]=3;
		x[3]=0;
	}else if(y[3]==-1){
		direction[3]=0;
		y[3]=0;
	}else if(x[3]==D){
		x[3]=D-1;
		direction[3]=1;
	}else if(y[3]==D){
		y[3]=D-1;
		direction[3]=2;
	}
}, 0);
setInterval(function () {
	//console.log(0);
   if ((++array[x[0]][y[0]]) == 1){
		direction[0]--;
		ctx.fillStyle="#00FFFF";
        ctx.fillRect(x[0] * d, y[0] * d, d, d);
    }else{
		direction[0]++;
		array[x[0]][y[0]] = 0;
    	ctx.clearRect(x[0] * d, y[0] * d, d, d);
	}
    
    if(direction[0]==-1)
		direction[0]=3;
	
	if(direction[0]==4)
		direction[0]=0;
		
    
    if (direction[0] == 0) {
        x[0]++;
    } else if (direction[0] == 1) {
        y[0]++;
    } else if (direction[0] == 2) {
        x[0]--;
    } else if (direction[0] == 3) {
        y[0]--;
    }
	
	if(x[0]==-1){
		direction[0]=3;
		x[0]=0;
	}else if(y[0]==-1){
		direction[0]=0;
		y[0]=0;
	}else if(x[0]==D){
		x[0]=D-1;
		direction[0]=1;
	}else if(y[0]==D){
		y[0]=D-1;
		direction[0]=2;
	}
}, 0);

setInterval(function () {
	//console.log(4);
   if ((++array[x[4]][y[4]]) == 1){
		direction[4]--;
		ctx.fillStyle="#FFFF00";
        ctx.fillRect(x[4] * d, y[4] * d, d, d);
    }else{
		direction[4]++;
		array[x[4]][y[4]] = 0;
    	ctx.clearRect(x[4] * d, y[4] * d, d, d);
	}
    
    if(direction[4]==-1)
		direction[4]=3;
	
	if(direction[4]==4)
		direction[4]=0;
		
    
    if (direction[4] == 0) {
        x[4]++;
    } else if (direction[4] == 1) {
        y[4]++;
    } else if (direction[4] == 2) {
        x[4]--;
    } else if (direction[4] == 3) {
        y[4]--;
    }
	
	if(x[4]==-1){
		direction[4]=3;
		x[4]=0;
	}else if(y[4]==-1){
		direction[4]=0;
		y[4]=0;
	}else if(x[4]==D){
		x[4]=D-1;
		direction[4]=1;
	}else if(y[4]==D){
		y[4]=D-1;
		direction[4]=2;
	}
}, 0);


ctx.fillRect(0, 0, 10, 10);
ctx.fillRect(990, 990, 10, 10);
ctx.fillRect(0, 990, 10, 10);
ctx.fillRect(990, 0, 10, 10);

 </script>
